articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Command of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Command of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected the command of the Air and Anti-Air Force of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 He was greeted on the spot by Air Force Col. General Choe Yong Ho, commander of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force, Air Force Lieut. General Son Chol Ju, political commissar of the Air and Anti-Air Force, and other commanding officers.
					
					 Kim Jong Un laid a bouquet before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il erected at the command and paid tribute to them in the humblest reverence.
					
					 He recalled that the  statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, founders and builders of the Juche-oriented air force, were erected at the command of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force before any commands of services and corps of the army on the significant day of the air force last year, adding  it was a manifestation of the noble loyalty and moral obligation of the service personnel of the Air and Anti-Air Force and all other service personnel and people to add eternal shine to their revolutionary exploits. 
					
					 He had a talk with the commanding officers of the KPA Air and Anti-Air Force.
					
					 He said that the airmen and commanding officers should think of combat awake or asleep  and handle all matters from the viewpoint of the combat preparations and correctly find out  and solve knotty problems at the highest level in the shortest possible time as required by the WPK's idea of military strategy and  tactics, Juche-oriented war methods and modern warfare.
					
					 Underscoring the need to intensify flight and battle drills, putting main emphasis on improving the quality of training, he said there is no need to have a drill irrelevant to actual battle even though it is conducted for a hundred, a thousand days. It is the party's intention to turn all exercises into those meeting the requirements of the modern warfare in contents, form and method and those staged under the simulated conditions of an actual battle, he noted. 
					
					 He went round the comprehensive sports and cultural facilities newly built at the command.
					
					 He highly appreciated their construction, saying the comprehensive gymnasium was designed well and constructed at a high level. Not only the construction of indoor swimming pool but also indoor volleyball and basketball courts, sauna and barber' shop are impeccable, he added.
					
					 Expressing satisfaction over the successful construction of the comprehensive sports and cultural facilities once again, he promised to make sure that a modern cinema is built so that the service personnel of the unit may watch movies and information on the latest military scientific and technological successes. 
					
					 He went round the indoor shooting gallery newly built at the command.
					
					 He praised the command for successfully building the indoor shooting gallery and watched commanding officers' shooting. He instructed it to regularly operate the gallery to prepare all of them as crack shots.
					
					 Noting that the work of the Air and Anti-Air Force for this year is well begun, he called on them to make 2015 a year of ushering in a heyday of the Air and Anti-Air Force. He specified tasks and ways for doing so.
					
					 He expressed belief and conviction that the service personnel of the unit would firmly guarantee the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms, keeping themselves fully ready for combat. 
					
					 Then he had a photo session with them.
					
					  He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau; Army General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces; Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Pyong Chol, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Kim Yo Jong, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Employees of Pace-setting Fields of Economy Renew New Year Pledge
articles.content:
Employees of Pace-setting Fields of Economy Renew New Year Pledge
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Meetings of employees of units of pace-setting fields and important sectors of the national economy took place in different parts of the country to vow to carry out the tasks set forth by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year address. 
					 Reporters and speakers said they will ensure the provision of coal to the important units including thermal power plants to bring about a great leap in power production. 
					
					 They also expressed their firm will to put main stress on science and technology and dynamically hasten the work to put the national economy on a modern and IT basis. 
					
					 They called for making active contribution to improving the people's living standards by producing more vinalon, fertilizer and a variety of other chemical goods.
					
					 They also pledged to meticulously organize transportation and conduct active drive for extra-haulage on schedule without accident to implement the decision of the 18th plenary meeting of the Fifth Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and thus satisfactorily meet increasing transportation requirements and ensure that all other economic sectors smoothly progress full of vigour.    They called upon all the people to enter the venue of grand October celebrations proudly with gifts they have prepared by dint of the revolutionary spirit of Paektu and through creative struggle, united close around the WPK.

articles.title: DPRK People Turn Out in Farming Preparation
articles.content:
DPRK People Turn Out in Farming Preparation
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK people have turned out in a campaign to assist the countryside in response to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year address that called for bringing about an upturn in improving the people's living standards with agricultural production, animal husbandry and fishing as the main thrusts this year.
					 Those in North Hwanghae Province provided its co-op farms with tens of thousands of tons of manure and many farming materials, including farm implements, vinyl sheets and accessories for tractors.
					
					 Officials and employees at different organs and industrial establishments in the province as well as housewives went to the farms with aid materials and helped peasants in farming preparations.
					
					 Those in South Hamgyong Province carried tens of thousands of tons of manure to provincial farms on January 4 alone, while Jagang and Kangwon provinces set in motion all manpower and vehicles for carrying manure to farm fields.
					
					 Officials of ministries and national institutions on January 9 went to cooperative farms for the first Friday labor this year, with much manure and many farming materials, and encouraged the agricultural workers in farming preparation.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Performed for Building Juche-based Militia Force
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Performed for Building Juche-based Militia Force
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Jan. 14 marks the 56th anniversary of the founding of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards.
					 Over the past 50 odd years, the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, the Juche-based people's defence forces,  have reliably carried out the socialist cause, each firmly holding  a hammer, sickle or writing brush in one hand and arms of revolution in the other.
					
					 This history is brilliantly recorded with the immortal revolutionary life and feats of President Kim Il Sung who provided a precious tradition of building the revolutionary people's defence forces in the crucible of the anti-Japanese struggle and opened a new chapter of the Juche-based militia defece force.
					
					 The President made a new history of the revolutionary militia force through his original ideological and theoretical activities and outstanding leadership in the first half of the 1930s.
					
					 He made speeches at various meetings including the meeting at Mingyuegou in December, Juche 20 (1931) and set forth the idea of waging an all-people resistance war to strengthen the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army and paramilitary organizations and defend guerrilla bases by arming all the people.
					
					 He paid deep attention to all issues ranging from the issue of letting people from all walks of life including Children's Corps members and young people join paramilitary organizations including the Children's Vanguard, the self-defence force against the Japanese army and young volunteers corps to their military drills and living.
					
					 He indicated tasks and ways for building revolutionary guerrilla bases in various places of the homeland and expanding and intensifying the struggle of people's armed organizations including production guerrillas, workers' shock brigades in various works and at meetings in the second half of the 1930s and the first half of the 1940s.
					
					 He went to secret bases in the homeland together with anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk in June, 1945, indicating concrete duties before the paramilitary organizations, and guided the final operation plan of the Rajin People's Armed Unit to be involved in the operation of the country's liberation at the secret rendezvous on Mt. Sahyang.
					
					 He energetically led the work to establish the militia force to defend itself the people's lives and properties after the liberation of the country.
					
					 After the war, he made a deep insight into the requirements of the developing Korean revolution and the changing situation in the country and reorganized the former people's self-defence force for its further development and proclaimed the founding of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, working people's militia force for self-defence, on Jan. 14, 1959.
					
					 The founding of the guards is the proud fruition of the President's military idea of self-defence and policy of putting all the people under arms and the shining victory of the traditional revolutionary mass line of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Embodying Idea of By Our Nation Itself
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Embodying Idea of By Our Nation Itself
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- It is the ardent aspiration and unanimous demand of the entire Korean nation to end the miserable history of national division, the tragic history of antagonism and confrontation that has lasted century after century and to open up the road of independent reunification, peace and prosperity, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 Only when we hold the idea of By Our Nation Itself as the guidelines and thoroughly apply it to the movement of national reunification, is it possible to achieve the national reconciliation, unity and independent reunification without fail. This is the truth proved by the reality of the June 15 era of reunification, the article says, adding:
					
					 Thanks to the patriotic Songun politics of leader Kim Jong Il, a turning phase of mending the inter-Korean relations was opened and the historic June 15 era of reunification provided to open up the road of independent reunification by the concerted efforts of Koreans.
					
					 Whoever aspires after the country's reunification with national conscience should get united and advance in one and the same ranks for the country's reunification. This was the noble politics of patriotism pursued by Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership and warm loving care, compatriots of different social standings at home and abroad and those who committed crimes before the country and the nation in the past broke with their past wrongdoings and turned out on the road of the great national unity and the country's reunification.
					
					 The outstanding and experienced leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, who is carrying forward the idea, leadership and traits of Kim Jong Il, serves as a powerful strength for dynamically opening up the road of independent reunification, peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of all the Koreans.

articles.title: DPRK Will Achieve Victory in Showdown with US: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Achieve Victory in Showdown with US: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The service personnel and people of the DPRK are convinced that this year will be recorded in history as the one that hastened the final victory, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article.
					 Their final victory in the showdown with the U.S. is not a long way off, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 They have a tradition of lawful victory that has lasted through generations.
					
					 They emerged victorious not only in the period after the liberation of the country and during the Fatherland Liberation War but also in the period of the post-war rehabilitation and in the subsequent period characterized by the fierce struggle to foil the U.S. imperialists' moves to ignite a new war.
					
					 The long history of the DPRK-U.S. showdown clearly proved that the winner was always the former.
					
					 On the contrary, the U.S. imperialists have a tradition of lawful defeat as it has historically sustained defeats, hit hard by the DPRK.
					
					 Giving a detailed account of the fact that the U.S. has resorted to the moves to put political pressure upon and isolate the DPRK and stifle its economy last year, the article says:
					
					 Such desperate moves all went belly-up.
					
					 Washington employed the whole gamut of base and impudent methods against the DPRK, only forcing the latter to bolster up its war deterrence for self-defence a thousand fold.
					
					 No matter how the international situation and the structure of relations with its surrounding countries may change, the DPRK will consistently adhere to the Songun politics and the line of promoting the two fronts simultaneously that can frustrate the moves of the enemy to stifle its socialist system, and staunchly strive to hasten the final victory.

articles.title: KCNA Denounces Sharing of Military Information among US, Japan, S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Denounces Sharing of Military Information among US, Japan, S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S., Japan and south Korea recently signed a contract on sharing information under the pretext of "coping with nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK. 
					 The contract which calls on the three parties to share in real-time information about "nuclear and missile attacks by north Korea" in order to promptly and effectively cope with them. The contract is reported to take effect from the very day of signing. 
					
					 The contract clearly proves that the military collusion and nexus among the U.S., Japan and south Korea have reached a more dangerous phase as it is a product of the U.S. strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The sharing of military information is aimed, first of all, at further rounding off the triangular military alliance structure for aggression, in actuality, by making a breakthrough towards establishing the triangular military alliance in Northeast Asia. 
					
					 The completion of the cooperation system in military information among the U.S., Japan and south Korea would lead to establishing and strengthening the triangular military alliance, cooperation system for a war against the DPRK and the rest of Northeast Asia. 
					
					 The U.S. is now seeking an unchallenged position in the Asia-Pacific region and working hard to build a barrier around big powers through the military alliance.
					
					 The contract amounts to the first process for establishing the U.S.-led missile defense system, in actuality, and it is mainly targeted at China and Russia. 
					
					 The U.S. has already concluded bilateral military agreements with Japan and south Korea respectively. Under this situation the U.S. attempts to ward off the influence of China and Russia in the region by establishing the triangular military cooperation system. 
					
					 The U.S. establishment of the system for sharing military information is timed to coincide with the frantic moves stepped up by it against Russia and China in all fields of politics, military and economy. 
					
					 The U.S. has persistently pushed ahead with the moves for laying a siege to Russia through the building of a European missile shield and the situation in Ukraine. It has recently kicked off all-out offensive against Russia. 
					
					 NATO has deployed a lot of its military bases in East European countries. Its aggressive scenario for permanent presence has entered the phase of full implementation.
					
					 These days the U.S. is intentionally interfering in the complicated regional disputes in a bid to win neighboring countries of China to its side and lay a siege to Beijing. This is a comment of most news analysts of the world.
					
					 The Sputnik News of Russia said that the U.S. is going to set up an organization similar to NATO in Asia to contain China and make Korea a "scapegoat" again in pushing forward this scenario. 
					
					 The confrontation structure is festering between China and Russia and the U.S., Japan and south Korea as the days go by owing to the U.S. aim to get hegemony in the region. 
					
					 The international community is seriously concerned about the fact that if the U.S.-led moves to complete military alliance are put into practice, the Korean peninsula would be bound to be a springboard for the U.S. war of aggression for world domination and a theater of the same fierce scramble among world powers as what used to be in the last century. 
					
					 The U.S. is further tightening the military collusion and nexus in the Asia-Pacific region under the pretext of non-existent "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK. This is a grave criminal act of extremely coiling up the tension in the region and sparking off new confrontation and arms race. 
					
					 The U.S. strategy for hegemony is no longer workable as it is making a mockery of the world with the hackneyed theory about "threats" from the DPRK.

articles.title: US, S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Naval Military Exercises
articles.content:
US, S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Stage Naval Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers announced they would stage joint military exercises in the East Sea of Korea on Jan. 13 and 14, according to a south Korean internet paper.
					 It was reported that Aegis destroyer belonging to the U.S. Seventh Fleet, a destroyer of the First Fleet of the south Korean navy and other preemptive attack means will be involved in the exercises.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers are openly challenging the demand of the DPRK for removing the danger of war and easing tension on the Korean peninsula, while trying to conceal the nature of the planned military exercises under the pretext of so-called "regular drills".

articles.title: Foot-and-Mouth Disease Continues Spreading in S. Korea
articles.content:
Foot-and-Mouth Disease Continues Spreading in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Foot-and-mouth disease again broke out in Sejong City, south Korea on January 7. 
					 Pigs with symptoms of the disease were found in various places of Ansong, Kyonggi Province on Jan. 8 and the same occurred on a stock farm in Richon of the same province on Jan. 10.

articles.title: Part-time Workers Suppressed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Part-time Workers Suppressed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean security authorities are frantically suppressing the part-time workers demanding their right to existence.
					 Those affiliated to the trade union of the Solidarity of Huimang have been on a strike since Nov. 20 last year in demand of stable employment, wage hike, shorter working hours and guarantee of trade union activities.
					
					 They occupied the building of the company head office in Seoul and staged a sit-in strike in demand of an interview with the management side on Jan. 6.
					
					 The security authorities hurled police to arrest at least 200 unionists and issued a warrant of arrest against leading members of the union on charges of "intrusion into building" and "disturbance of performance of duty."
					
					 They also threatened to take a legal action against at least 400 unionists who took part in the strike.
					
					 The trade union declared an action in protest against the suppression.

articles.title: Forcible Disbandment of Political Party Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
Forcible Disbandment of Political Party Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Former members of local assemblies from the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) in south Korea rejected the decision made by the authorities on disbanding the party on Jan. 7, according to south Korean internet papers.
					 That day those of Kwangju City, North and South Jolla provinces held a press conference outside the building of the Jonju District Court of North Jolla Province at which they termed the decision of the regime invalid.
					
					 They censured the central election management committee for deciding to deprive those from the UPP of their qualifications on Dec. 22 last year in the wake of the disbandment decision by the "constitutional court".
					
					 They declared the decision of the central election management committee not only null and void but illegal, charging the committee aligned itself with the "constitutional court" in disregard of its duty.
					
					 On the same day Ri Jae Hwa, a south Korean lawyer, at a seminar in Kwangju denounced the decision on the forcible disbandment of the UPP as a premeditated fabrication. 
					
					 It is contradictory to charge that a mass political party which has conducted activities under its open action programme had hidden purposes, the lawyer noted, adding:
					
					 History will set right the wrong decision.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams Authorities for Suppressing Korean Professor in US
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams Authorities for Suppressing Korean Professor in US
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People on Monday posted an editorial in denunciation of the authorities for suppression of Korean Professor in U.S. Sin Un Mi. 
					 The editorial said:
					
					 Sin Un Mi was forcefully exiled from south Korea as she said the same compatriots as us were living in the north and blood is thicker than water. 
					
					 She said that peaceful reunification of Korea should be achieved at an early date as the people in the south and the north are the same nation which has the same language and history and sings the same song "Arirang". 
					
					 But these were termed "crimes" by the present chief executive. 
					
					 Now in south Korea everything is ruled by her words, turning it into society where rule of law is relinquished. 
					
					 One can hardly understand how the chief executive can talk about "unification" after plunging the south Korean society into such a catastrophe. 
					
					 The editorial queried how she is going to unify the country when she incriminates the remarks calling the people in the north fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Japan's Distortion of History Accused
articles.content:
Japan's Distortion of History Accused
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Japan is running high fever in tampering with its history, persistently denying its sexual slavery, a hideous crime against humanity.
					 It was reported that the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan took measures to delete expressions dealing with Japan's sexual slavery from textbooks of senior high schools on December 11, 2014.
					
					 As a result, expressions "comfort women for the army" and "forcible drafting" all disappeared from textbooks on modern society and textbooks on political economy released by a publishing house of Japan.
					
					 These distorted textbooks were made to be used from this year.
					
					 This shameless distortion of history is an insult to victims of sexual slavery and all other women and an outright challenge to the international society aspiring after the settlement of the sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions on the New Year address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un took place by the Communist Party of Tajikistan and the Socialist Party of Romania and in Yobe State, Nigeria on Jan. 6.
					 Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, said:
					
					 The New Year address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, is evoking the great repercussion of the world.
					
					 The Communist Party of Tajikistan fully supports his historic New Year address.
					
					 The diligent Korean people will continue to win only victories in their struggle for building an economic power and improving the people's living standards and in their efforts for smashing the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' moves and defending socialism, united closer around the WPK led by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, expressed his resolution to give wide publicity to Kim Jong Un's New Year address and wage more dynamic activities to support the struggle of the Korean people who turned out in the drive for implementing the tasks set forth in the New Year address.
					
					 The minister of Agriculture of Yobe State, Nigeria affirmed that the Korean people would accomplish the national reunification, the lifelong desire of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the supreme national desire, and surely build the prosperous reunified power under the wise leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The permanent secretary of the Ministry of Education in Yobe State, Nigeria expressed belief that the party and government of the DPRK would strengthen in every way the bonds and solidarity with the world progressive peoples who love peace and aspire after independence and justice, and actively develop good neighbourly relations with all countries that respect its sovereignty and are friendly to it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Ugandan Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Ugandan Personage
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement made public a statement on Jan. 8 in support of the New Year address made by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 The statement said:
					
					 In his New Year address Kim Jong Un indicated the orientation and ways for bolstering defense capability of the country, improving the people's living standards and building a socialist economic giant and highly civilized nation.
					
					 He also put up the slogan "Let the whole nation join efforts to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification in this year of the 70th anniversary of national liberation!" He proposed that the north and the south should refrain from seeking confrontation of systems while absolutizing their own ideologies and systems but achieve great national unity true to the principle of By Our Nation Itself to satisfactorily resolve the reunification issue in conformity with the common interests of the nation.
					
					 We warmly welcome the proposals for reunifying Korea laid out by supreme leader Kim Jong Un and fully support them.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respond to the DPRK's peace-loving proposals without delay, not bargaining or weighing them.
					
					 The U.S. should abandon its attempt to stifle the DPRK, fortress of independence and justice, by force of arms and make a political decision of respecting the sovereignty of the DPRK.

articles.title: Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Celebrated by British Organization
articles.content:
Assumption of KPA Supreme Commandership Celebrated by British Organization
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association UK issued a statement on Dec. 29 last year in celebration of the third anniversary of Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement said:
					
					 It is the manifestation of the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered and victoriously led by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il that they held Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un has successfully carried out the Juche-oriented cause of army-building for the past three years.
					
					 Under his leadership, the KPA has developed into the matchless ranks capable of smashing any provocation by the U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, at a single blow.
					
					 His august name is more brilliantly shining with victories in the confrontation with imperialists.
					
					 He inspired the army and people of the DPRK to the struggle against the U.S. imperialists' provocations and thus made a great contribution to ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of the world.
					
					 We extend the warm militant greetings to him.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Terrorist Act Denounced in Different Countries
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Terrorist Act Denounced in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, January 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League in a statement on Jan. 6 denounced the south Korean authorities for perpetrating such terrorist act as forcibly disbanding the Unified Progressive Party (UPP), a legitimate political party, and depriving lawmakers from the party of their membership of the "National Assembly" (NA).
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to cancel the disbandment of the UPP and restore the NA membership of the lawmakers from the party.
					
					 It also demanded them discontinue all search operations and scrap the "Security Law" which is trampling down democratic movement.
					
					 It extended full support and solidarity to the democratic forces and workers in south Korea in their struggle.
					
					 The Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria in a letter of protest sent to the south Korean embassy in Vienna expressed indignation at the forcible disbandment of the UPP.
					
					 This indicates that the south Korean authorities are bringing back the dark fascist rule in the past, the letter said.
					
					 It urged the south Korean ruling quarters to retract the decision on disbanding the UPP, set free all those who were put behind bars for the mere reason that they fought for peaceful reunification of Korea and inter-Korean dialogue and abolish the fascist "Security Law."
					
					 This is the demand of the times for this year marking the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, it added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona comandancia de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona comandancia de fuerzas aereas y antiaereas de EPC
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la comandancia de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC.
					Le acogieron en el terreno el coronel general de las fuerzas aereas Choe Yong Ho, comandante de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC, el comisario politico y teniente general de las fuerzas aereas Son Chol Ju y otros miembros de mando.
					
					Ante todo, el Mariscal deposito un ramo de flores ante las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il erguidas altamente en dicha comandancia y le rindio el maximo homenaje.
					
					El Mariscal dijo que con motivo del significativo dia de aviacion del ano expirado se construyeron primero esas estatuas en dicha comandancia entre las unidades de tipo de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpo, lo cual constituye la expresion de noble fidelidad y la obligacion moral de todos los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas y todos los uniformados y civiles de glorificar para siempre las hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente y el Dirigente, fundadores y constructores de las autoctonas fuerzas aereas.
					
					Seguidamente, el Mariscal converso con los miembros de mando de las fuerzas aereas y antiaereas del EPC.
					
					Instruyo que todos los pilotos y los miembros directivos deben pensar siempre en la batalla, observar y tratar todos los asuntos desde el punto de vista de los preparativos de combate y hallar correctamente las dificultades y resolverlas en un periodo mas breve y en nivel supremo segun la demanda de la idea del partido sobre las estrategias y tacticas militares y los autoctonos metodos de combate y la guerra moderna.
					
					Es necesario intensificar el entrenamiento combativo de vuelo concentrando la fuerza en elevar la calidad del ejercicio, subrayo. Y continuo que los ejercicios ajenos a la batalla real son innecesarios completamente.
					
					Anadio que la intencion del partido es realizar el ejercicio, aunque sea un adiestramiento, cuyo su contenido, formacion y metodo se convienen a la batalla contemporanea y al ambiente de batalla real.
					
					El Mariscal recorrio las facilidades generales deportivo-culturales nuevamente acondicionadas en la comandancia.
					
					Se llevo bien el diseno del centro deportivo y llego a nivel elevado su construccion, acoto el Mariscal y siguio evaluando altamente que se hayan construidos perfectamente la piscina bajo techo, los campos de voleibol y baloncesto bajo techo, la sauna y la barberia.
					
					Volvio a mostrar su satisfaccion diciendo que esas instalaciones se construyeron vistosamente y prometio construir bien un cine para que los oficiales y soldados de la comandancia puedan ver las peliculas y otros datos de ultimos exitos de ciencias y tecnicas militares.
					
					El Mariscal paso revista al centro de tiro bajo techo construido nuevamente en la comandancia.  
					
					Evaluo que se construyo bien el centro de tiro y presenciando el tiro de los miembros de mando ordeno formar a todos miembros directivos como tiradores certeros al normalizar la gestion del centro.
					
					Recalcando que este ano, las fuerzas aereas emprendieron sus trabajos con buen inicio, destaco la necesidad de convertir el ano corriente como el que se extendera una epoca de prosperidad en las fuerzas aereas. Y presento las tareas y remedios detallados para ese fin.
					
					Manifesto su esperanza y conviccion de que los oficiales y soldados de la comandancia defenderan firmemente con el fusil la causa revolucionaria del Juche encontrandose siempre en la preparacion completa para combate, y tomo foto de recuerdo junto con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la direccion politica general del EPC, el general de las fuerzas terrestres Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, Han Kwang Sang, jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Ri Pyong Chol, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y Kim Yo Jong, subjefa de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Deciden cumplir tareas del mensaje de ano nuevo en sectores importantes de economia
articles.content:
Deciden cumplir tareas del mensaje de ano nuevo en sectores importantes de economia 
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en distintos lugares los mitines de los empleados de las unidades de sectores priorizados e importantes industrias de la economia nacional para jurar el cumplimiento de las tareas presentadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo.
					 En las ocasiones hubo informes y discursos de juramento.
					
					  Los oradores tomaron decisiones de suministrar incondicionalmente el carbon necesario a las centrales termoelectricas y otros establecimientos industriales importantes y producir gran salto en la produccion de electricidad.
					
					 Dijeron que consideraran las ciencias y tecnicas como la forma de existencia y aceleraran al estilo coreano la modernizacion e informatizacion.
					
					  Resaltaron la necesidad de producir mucho el vinalon, el abono y otros productos quimicos para contribuir al mejoramiento de los niveles de la vida del pueblo.
					
					  Prosiguieron que realizaran con escrupulosidad la organizacion y mando de transporte, desarrollaran con energia el movimiento de supertraccion, circulacion al horario y sin accidente para el cumplimiento de la resolucion del 18o pleno de la 5a legislatura del CC del PTC y cubrir asi las demandas de transporte, de manera que todos los sectores economicos se desarrollen a buen ritmo.
					
					  Subrayaron que todos, unidos firmemente en torno del Partido, deben preparar valiosos regalos con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y la accion creadora para presenciar dignamente el proximo gran festival de octubre.

articles.title: RPDC lograra victoria final en confrontacion con EE.UU., apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
RPDC lograra victoria final en confrontacion con EE.UU., apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea estan convencidos de que este ano se registrara en la historia como ano ligado con la victoria final.
					 No es lejano el dia de la victoria final en la confrontacion con Estados Unidos.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este martes y continua:
					
					  Tenemos la tradicion de victorias naturales que prosiguio de siglo en siglo.
					
					  Logramos victorias tras victorias despues de la liberacion del pais, en el periodo de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, en el de restauracion y reconstruccion posbelica y en la batalla por frustrar las maniobras de provocacion de una nueva guerra de los imperialistas yanquis.
					
					  La larga historia de confrontacion entre la RPDC y EE.UU. comprueba evidentemente que el triunfador fue siempre el pueblo coreano.
					
					  Al contrario, los imperialistas norteamericanos tienen historicamente las tradiciones de derrota natural.
					
					  El ano pasado, EE.UU. se desespero por presionar en lo politico y aislar y sofocar en lo economico a la RPDC, pero tales maniobras se deshicieron como una espuma.
					
					  EE.UU. aplico los metodos viles y descarados, pero tales maquinaciones impulsaron a la RPDC a fortalecer por todos los medios el disuasivo de guerra de autodefensa.
					
					La RPDC mantendra invariablemente la politica de Songun y el lineamiento de desarrollo simultaneo para frustrar las maniobras del enemigo encaminadas a eliminar nuestro regimen socialista y desarrollara con dinamismo la lucha por adelantar la victoria final no importa que la situacion internacional cambie y las relaciones entre los paises vecinos varien.

articles.title: ACNC critica la firma de acuerdo EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC critica la firma de acuerdo EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, fue firmado el acuerdo de compartimiento de informaciones EE.UU.-Japon-Sur de Corea bajo el pretexto de hacer frente a la "amenaza nuclear y de misiles" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					El acuerdo entra en vigencia desde el dia de su firma. 
					
					Segun el documento, las tres partes compartiran en tiempo real las informaciones necesarias para hacer frente rapido y eficiente al posible ataque nuclear y de misiles del Norte de Corea. 
					
					Pues, el acuerdo es un producto de la estrategia norteamericana de hegemonia sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico y evidencia que la confabulacion militar tripartita entra en etapa muy aventurera. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que en el Nordeste Asiatico se abre la brecha para el establecimiento de la alianza militar tripartita.
					
					En caso de completarse el sistema de cooperacion tripartita en el dominio de informaciones militares, esto traera el establecimiento y fortalecimiento de la alianza militar tripartita como aparato de guerra contra la RPDC y el Nordeste Asiatico. 
					
					Ahora EE.UU. pretende mantener mediante la alianza militar su posicion hegemonica en la region de Asia-Pacifico y formar las barreras en el contorno de las potencias. 
					
					El acuerdo en cuestion, siendo primer proceso del establecimiento del sistema antimisiles bajo el mando de EE.UU., toma por blancos principales a China y Rusia. 
					
					EE.UU. ya concerto por separado con Japon y el Sur de Corea el acuerdo militar bilateral y ahora trata de restar las influencias de China y Rusia mediante el establecimiento del sistema de cooperacion militar tripartita. 
					
					El compartimiento de informaciones militares coincide con la campana anti-Rusia y anti-China que lanza EE.UU. en el dominio politico, militar, economico, etc. 
					
					EE.UU. persiguio tenazmente el cerco anti-Rusia mediante el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles de Europa y el incidente de Ucrania y ahora vuelve a iniciar la ofensiva total contra Rusia. 
					
					Se pone en practica el intento agresivo de EE.UU. de emplazar las bases militares de la OTAN en los paises de Europa Oriental. 
					
					Los especialistas del mundo estiman que en estos tiempos el imperio se desespera por formar el cerco anti-China atrayendo a los paises perifericos interviniendo intencionalmente en los conflictos regionales. 
					
					La agencia noticiera rusa Sputnik insistio en que EE.UU. intenta fabricar en Asia un aparato semejante a la OTAN para mantener a rayas a China sacrificando otra vez a Corea. 
					
					Hoy dia, debido a la ambicion hegemonica de EE.UU., se agrava mas la estructura de enfrentamiento China y Rusia vs. EE.UU., Japon y el Sur de Corea en la region de Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					La sociedad internacional se preocupa mucho de que el perfeccionamiento de la alianza militar bajo el mando de EE.UU. convertira la Peninsula Coreana en la cabeza de puente de la agresion de EE.UU., al igual que en el siglo pasado. 
					
					La confabulacion militar tripartita en la region de Asia-Pacifico bajo el pretexto de la "amenaza nuclear y de misiles" de la RPDC agrava extremadamente la situacion regional y acarrea nuevo enfrentamiento y carrera armamentista. 
					
					Es inaceptable la estrategia hegemonica de EE.UU.
